languages.text: On hit target must succeed at Willpower (+20) or gain Inert Warp for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: On hit target must succeed at Willpower (+20) or gain Inert Warp for 1 round.

languages.text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} этим оружием, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с бонусом +20 и в случае провала получают психосоматическую {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травму{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Targets hit with this weapon must pass a Willpower resistance test with a +20 bonus or suffer psychosomatic trauma for 1 round.

Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Bu silahla {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulan{/g} düşmanlar, +20 bonusa sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde ruhsezi {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travmasına{/g} maruz kalırlar. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bu silahla vurulan düşmanlar, +20 bonusa sahip bir İrade direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde ruhsezi travmasına maruz kalırlar. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer.

Bu silahla vurulan düşmanlar, +20 bonusa sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde ruhsezi travmasına maruz kalırlar. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.

languages.text: Los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}alcanzados{/g} por esta arma deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una bonificación de +20 para no sufrir una {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g} psicosomática durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los objetivos alcanzados por esta arma deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad con una bonificación de +20 para no sufrir un traumatismo psicosomático durante 1 asalto.

languages.text: 被这把武器{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+20加值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入精神{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 被这把武器命中的目标需要进行意志抗性检定，且在此次检定中获得+20加值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入精神创伤状态，持续一轮。

languages.text: Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par cette arme doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec un bonus de +20, sans quoi elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumatisme{/g} psychosomatique pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les cibles touchées par cette arme doivent réussir un test de résistance de Force mentale avec un bonus de +20, sans quoi elles subissent l'effet Traumatisme psychosomatique pendant 1 round.

languages.text: この武器に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}されたターゲットは、+20のボーナスで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間心因性{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}トラウマ{/g}状態になる。
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この武器に攻撃されたターゲットは、+20のボーナスで意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間心因性トラウマ状態になる。
この武器に攻撃されたターゲットは、+20のボーナスで意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間心因性トラウマ状態になる。

languages.text: Mit dieser Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Gegner müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem Bonus von +20 bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang ein psychosomatisches {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g} zu erleiden.
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Mit dieser Waffe getroffene Gegner müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf Willenskraft mit einem Bonus von +20 bestehen, um nicht 1 Runde lang ein psychosomatisches Trauma zu erleiden.

languages.text: Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} этим оружием, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с бонусом +20 и в случае провала получают психосоматическую {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травму{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} этим оружием, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусом{/g} +20 и в случае провала получают психосоматическую травму на 1 раунд.
